reviews.text: Lovely place to enjoy a family day out especially when the sun is out
Nice little Scottish town. If you like ice-cream, then this is the place for you.
Lots of nice touristy things to do and see! Lots of lovely little shops and pebble shorelinetheres also amusements for the kids and adults and don't forget the ferry to Cumbrae

Lovely small station at the end of the line from Glasgow, trains coming in regularly. Right next to the centre of largs which is the best town with plenty things to do and see, has great helpful staff and is right in the heat of things if you need to get anyway in largs or a short way out of largs to Glasgow. Over all great place, location and well kept
Small station at the end of the line from Glasgow Central with friendly helpful staff. You can park for free in the station car park which is tiny only if you by a journey ticket.
